Risk Description: Consensus Hallucination: Agents reinforcing false data loops.
Proposed Control (NIST): SI-10: Information Input Validation (Ground Truth Oracles)

Risk Description: Emergent Hierarchy: Agents dominating discourse via frequency.
Malicious Injection: Bad actors introducing radicalized agents.
Proposed Control (NIST): IA-2: Identification and Authentication (Agent ID Verification)

Risk Description: Synthetic Evidence: AI-generated images used for fraud (e.g. fake tire damage).
Data Leakage: Agents sharing PII in unmoderated chats.
